item.title: [317]problems with text above head
item.dc:creator: @kalvin139 kalvin139
item.description:
@kalvin139 wrote:

hello i wanted to make npc say something above head but it didnt show up!
heres part of my npchandler.java:

} else if (npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc == true) { AttackNPC(i); 
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 2323) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "use bones on altar for more exp!!";
                    }
                    }
				}
				if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) {
					npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();
				}</blockquote>

im using delta base

Read full topic
